name: Transitum - Chapter 1
description:
This game is playable with the range time of 5-10 minutes of gameplay. If you like it, drop the comment below we will make the second chapter of the series.

This is the release of the first chapter which took the place of a beginning of a curse that may lead to death if fail to survive.

It's about the dark story of the character which leads him to something that is unexpected to happen in his life.

Feel free to donate to us atleast $1 for the development budget.
